title: Grethe
overview: Meet the Bynke family: Father Jørgen, mother Charlotte and the three children Ingrid, Frederikke and Valdemar. And not to forget - Jørgen's sister, Clara, who lives in the attic. The family lives a chaotic life, where everything is a mess, mother and father drive each other crazy, and a copper wedding must be planned. The children live through camera lenses and tablets in their own worlds. Jørgen and Charlotte decide that they must have a young girl in the house. But a young girl it will not be.
